name: Social Income
description: Social Income provides an end-to-end solution to manage direct-cash transfer projects or universal basic income pilots. This includes funding grassroots fundraising, contributor management, selection management with third-party NGOs and payment management (not the actual payment, this can be done with any local mobile money provider).

SDGs.evidenceText: It fights poverty by giving people in poverty the means to escape the poverty trap
We carry out a direct redistribution of wealth based on solidarity and enabled by technology.
